title: BREAKING: President Trump Announces Massive Executive Orders on Immigration
text:
With Obama Gone, Fed Judge Reveals Admin’s “Stunning” True Behavior… It’s Bad 
On Wednesday, during a visit the Department of Homeland Security — appropriately enough, Trump signed his first executive orders on immigration order, according to Reuters . The orders included building Trump’s long-touted wall on the southern border and a crackdown on so-called “sanctuary cities” that flout federal immigration laws. 
Using his favorite outreach medium, Trump gave us a glimpse of his plans Tuesday night: Big day planned on NATIONAL SECURITY tomorrow. Among many other things, we will build the wall! 
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) January 25, 2017 
After signing the orders Wednesday, Trump used his remarks to elaborate on the situation. Advertisement - story continues below 
“We are in the middle of a crisis on our southern border: The unprecedented surge of illegal migrants from Central American is harming both Mexico and the United States,” he said, according to Reuters. 
“And I believe the steps we will take starting right now will improve the safety in both of our countries. A nation without borders is not a nation.” 
In an interview with ABC News, Trump said construction on the wall could begin within months. 
The order also precedes a meeting with Mexican President Enrique Pena Nieto, according to the New York Daily News . Advertisement - story continues below
